sections.heading: 1. Eligibility
content: You must be at least 18 years old and able to enter a legally binding contract to use MyAZStore and make purchases.

sections.heading: 2. Use of Our Website
content: You agree not to misuse the website or attempt to disrupt its functionality.
This includes attempting unauthorized access, uploading harmful files, or interfering with servers.

sections.heading: 3. Product Information
content: We strive to provide accurate product descriptions, images, and pricing.
However, errors may occur and we reserve the right to correct them without notice.

sections.heading: 4. Orders & Payments
content: Orders are confirmed only after successful payment authorization.
We may cancel or refuse orders in cases of payment failure, suspected fraud, incorrect pricing, or stock unavailability.

sections.heading: 5. Pricing & Billing
content: All prices include applicable taxes unless specified otherwise.
You authorize us to charge your selected payment method for the full order amount.

sections.heading: 6. Shipping & Delivery
content: Delivery timelines are estimates and may vary due to courier delays or unforeseen circumstances.
Risk passes to you once the order is handed over to the courier.

sections.heading: 7. Returns, Refunds & Cancellations
content: Our Returns & Refund Policy defines conditions for returns and cancellations.
Once an order is shipped, cancellation eligibility depends on product category.

sections.heading: 8. User Accounts
content: You are responsible for maintaining account confidentiality.
Report unauthorized access immediately.

sections.heading: 9. Intellectual Property
content: All content, graphics, and branding belong to MyAZStore and may not be reused without permission.

sections.heading: 10. Limitation of Liability
content: We are not liable for direct, indirect, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.
Use the website at your own risk.

sections.heading: 11. Privacy & Data Protection
content: Your data is processed according to our Privacy Policy.
By using our website, you consent to such processing.

sections.heading: 12. Changes to Terms
content: We may update these Terms at any time.
Changes take effect as soon as they are posted on this page.

sections.heading: 13. Contact Information
content: Email: support@myazstore.shop
